DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether treatment rosuvastatin 6 month obese type 2 diabetic woman improve lipid profile thus prevent progression cardiovascular disease .
DOC.brief_title: C-Reactive Protein ( CRP ) Obese Diabetic Women
DOC.criteria: Menopausal Diagnosed diabetes mellitus type 2 Obese ( body mass index [ BMI ] > 25 ≤ 30 ) Fasting blood glucose ≥ 200 mg/dl CRP < 2 mg/L > 10 mg/L
